original_text: And it came to pass, when Rehoboam had established the kingdom, and had strengthened himself, he forsook the law of the Lord, and all Israel with him.
korean_text: 르호보암의 나라가 견고하고 세력이 강해지매 그가 여호와의 율법을 버리니 온 이스라엘이 본받은지라

sentences.original_text: when Rehoboam had established the kingdom
he forsook the law of the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 이스라엘도 그와 함께 하였다
